InstallÂ¶

  1. Install python 2.6 or 2.7

  2. Install pip

  3. Ensure pip is up-to-date:

    pip install --upgrade pip

  4. Install x/84:

    pip install x84

  5. Upgrading:

    pip install --upgrade x84
